xbrlcore.linkbase
Class Linkbase

java.lang.Object
  xbrlcore.linkbase.Linkbase
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
CalculationLinkbase, DefinitionLinkbase, LabelLinkbase, PresentationLinkbase
public class Linkbase
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable

This class is a superclass for all classes implementing linkbases. It provides basic linkbase methods each linkbase has to implement. It has to manage a list of xbrlcore.xlink.ExtendedLinkElement and xbrlcore.xlink.Arc objects.

Author:
Daniel Hamm
See Also:
Serialized Form

Returns:
Base set of arcs from the default link role.

getArcBaseSet

public java.util.List getArcBaseSet(java.lang.String arcrole,
                                    java.lang.String extendedLinkRole)
Returns a base set of arcs (list of Arc objects) with a given arcrole in a given exended link role.

Parameters:
arcrole - Role of the arc.
extendedLinkRole - Extended link role of the linkbase. If NULL, the default link role is taken.
Returns:
List of arc objects that match to the given parameters.

                                    java.lang.String extendedLinkRole)
Returns a base set of arcs (list of Arc objects) with a given list of arc roles (list of String objects) in a given extended link role.

Parameters:
arcrole - List of arc roles (String objects).
extendedLinkRole - Extended link role of the linkbase.
Returns:
List of arc objects that match to the given parameters.

addExtendedLinkElement

public void addExtendedLinkElement(ExtendedLinkElement element)
                            throws TaxonomyCreationException
Adds a new ExtendedLinkElement (either a resource or a locator) object to the list of objects.

Parameters:
element - The XLinkElement object that shall be added.
Throws:
TaxonomyCreationException

addArc

public void addArc(Arc newArc)
Adds a new Arc to the linkbase. The order of the arc is taken into account, so it is placed at the correct position within its base set. It is also determined whether this arc is a prohibiting or overriding arc for another one.

Parameters:
newArc - The Arc object that shall be added.

getResource

public Resource getResource(java.lang.String id)
Returns a resource for a certain ID.

Parameters:
id - ID for which the resource is taken.
Returns:
The according xbrlcore.link.Resource object which matches the given ID.

getExtendedLinkElements

public java.util.List getExtendedLinkElements(java.lang.String label,
                                              java.lang.String extendedLinkRole,
                                              java.lang.String linkbaseSource)
Returns the according extended link element objects to a given label within a given extended link role. According to Spec. section 3.5.3.9, there can be multiple same labels within one extended link role, since one-to-many and many-to-many arc representations are possible.

Parameters:
label - Label of the extended link element object.
extendedLinkRole - Extended link role of the linkbase.
Returns:
List with all ExtendedLinkElement objects matching the given parameters.

getExtendedLinkElementsFromBaseSet

public java.util.List getExtendedLinkElementsFromBaseSet(java.lang.String extendedLinkRole)
Returns only those extended link elements (list of ExtendedLinkElement) which are part of the base set of arcs.

Parameters:
extendedLinkRole - Extended link role of the linkbase
Returns:
List with all ExtendedLinkElement objects matching the given parameters. Furthermore, they must be part of the base set of arcs.

getExtendedLinkElementFromBaseSet

public ExtendedLinkElement getExtendedLinkElementFromBaseSet(Concept concept,
                                                             java.lang.String extendedLinkRole)
Returns a locator from a specific base set to a specific concept. To each concept, there can be only one locator within one extended link role AND within one base set of arcs. If there are mulitple locators, not all of the corresponding arcs are part of the base set (i.e. one arc is overriding another).

Parameters:
concept - The concept for which all XLinkElement objects shall be determined.
extendedLinkRole - Extended link role of the linkbase.
Returns:
Locator of the concept from the base set of arcs in the given extended link role.

getTargetExtendedLinkElements

public java.util.List getTargetExtendedLinkElements(Concept concept,
                                                    java.lang.String extendedLinkRole)
Returns all extended link element objects a certain concept is linked to. That is, the concept is the "from" element, and the return list contains all the "to" elements, but only those of arcs belonging to the base set of arcs (i.e. overriden links are not taken into account).

Parameters:
concept - Concept which is the source of the links.
extendedLinkRole - Extended link role of the linkbase.
Returns:
List of extended link element objects which the given concept is linked to.

getSourceExtendedLinkElements

public java.util.List getSourceExtendedLinkElements(Concept concept,
                                                    java.lang.String extendedLinkRole)
Returns all extended link element objects a certain concept is linked from. That is, the concept is the "to" element, and the return list contains all the "from" elements, but only those of arcs belonging to the base set of arcs (i.e. overriden links are not taken into account).

Parameters:
concept - Concept which is the target of the links.
extendedLinkRole - Extended link role of the linkbase.
Returns:
List of extended link element objects which are linked to the given concept.

addExtendedLinkRole

public void addExtendedLinkRole(java.lang.String xbrlExtendedLinkRole)
Adds a new extended link role to the linkbase.

Parameters:
xbrlExtendedLinkRole - New extended link role.

buildSourceNetwork

public java.util.Set buildSourceNetwork(Concept concept,
                                        java.lang.String arcRole,
                                        java.lang.String extendedLinkRole)
Returns a list with the complete "source network" of extended link elements in the given extended link role for the given concept. So if there is a link (= an arc) from concept a to concept b, and one from concept b to concept c, the "source network" of extended link elements for concept c would be the according extended link element for concept b and concept a.

Parameters:
concept - XBRL concept for which the source network shall be obtained.
arcRole - The arcRole attribute of the links.
extendedLinkRole - Extended link role of the linkbase.
Returns:
List with ExtendedLinkElement objects of the source network of the given concept.

buildTargetNetwork

public java.util.Set buildTargetNetwork(Concept concept,
                                        java.lang.String arcRole,
                                        java.lang.String extendedLinkRole)
                                 throws XBRLException
Returns a list with all the extended link elements in the given extended link role which are linked to a certain concept. That means, if a concept a is linked to concept b and c, and concept b is linked to concept d and e, the "target network" for concept a would contain the extended link element objects of concept b, c, d and e.

Parameters:
concept - XBRL concept for which the target network shall be obtained.
arcRole - The arcRole attribute of the links.
extendedLinkRole - Extended link role of the linkbase.
Returns:
List with ExtendedLinkElement objects of the target network of the given concept.
Throws:
XBRLException

getArcForSourceLocator

public Arc getArcForSourceLocator(Locator loc)
Returns an Arc for a given source locator (only base set of arcs is taken into account).

Parameters:
loc - Source locator for which the arc shall be obtained.
Returns:
Arc with the given source locator.

getArcForTargetLocator

public Arc getArcForTargetLocator(Locator loc)
Returns an Arc for a given target locator (only base set of arcs is taken into account).

Parameters:
loc - Target locator for which the arc shall be obtained.
Returns:
Arc with the given target locator.

getTargetArcsFromExtendedLinkElement

public java.util.List getTargetArcsFromExtendedLinkElement(ExtendedLinkElement xLinkElement,
                                                           java.lang.String arcRole,
                                                           java.lang.String extendedLinkRole)
                                                    throws XBRLException
Gets all the arc objects which link from a given extended link element to any other one.

Parameters:
xLinkElement - The extended link element for which the target network shall be obtained.
arcRole - The arcrole attribute of the links. If NULL, the arcrole is not taken into account.
extendedLinkRole - The extended link role of the linkbase. If NULL, the default link role is taken.
Returns:
List with arc objects which belongs to the target network of the given extended link element.
Throws:
XBRLException

getExtendedLinkRoles

public java.util.Set getExtendedLinkRoles()
Returns:
Set of String objects representing the extended link roles of the linkbase.

getDts

protected DiscoverableTaxonomySet getDts()
Returns:
Discoverable taxonomy set this linkbase refers to.

getExtendedLinkElements

public java.util.Set getExtendedLinkElements()
Returns:
List with extendedLinkElement objects.

getArcsBaseSet

public java.util.Map getArcsBaseSet()
Returns:
List with Arc objects.
